php.desc_CreatedEmail: Добавяне на имейл съобщение в crm.
php.desc_BindCompetition: Create relation of email message with competition record that contains email address.
php.desc_BindOSSEmployees: Create relation of email message with employee record that contains email address.
php.desc_BindPartners: Create relation of email message with partner record that contains email address.
php.desc_BindVendors: Create relation of email message with vendor record that contains email address.
php.desc_BindContacts: Create relation of email message with contact record that contains email address.
php.desc_BindAccounts: Create relation of email message with account record that has this email address.
php.desc_BindLeads: Create relation of email message with lead record that has this email address.
php.desc_BindSSalesProcesses: Create relation of email message with potential record based on prefix with number in subject.
php.desc_BindHelpDesk: Create relation of email message with helpdesk record based on prefix with number in subject.
php.desc_BindProject: Create relation of email message with project record based on prefix with number in subject.
php.desc_BindServiceContracts: Create relation of email message with project record based on account associated with email.
php.desc_BindCampaigns: Create relation of email message with campaign record based on prefix with number in subject.
php.LBL_EMPTY_PARAMETER: The parameter in the configuration is empty
php.LBL_NO_ACTION: Relate to current ticket (if relating action is added)
php.LBL_CONFTAB_CHANGE_TICKET_STATUS: What should the scanner do when we receive a mail regarding a ticket that has been closed?
php.Alert_no_module_title: This module was not found or is turned off.
php.Alert_no_module_desc: Scanner module requires that you install and activate OSSMail module. Check if this module is installed, if not you need to install it.
php.Alert_no_accounts_desc: To activate email scanner you need to first login to email account in OSSMail module.
php.Alert_info_tab_actions: File with email actions is located in: modules/OSSMailScanner/scanneractions/
php.Alert_no_email_acconts_desc: To configure the folders you need to login the first time to chosen mailbox.
php.Alert_info_tab_email_search: Choose fields that will be used to search for recipient of email message.
php.Alert_info_tab_folder: Choose folders that will be scanned while downloading email messages.
php.Alert_info_tab_accounts: Choose what actions should be triggered for individual email accounts.
php.Alert_info_tab_record_numbering: Prefixes are used to relate email message with other data in crm. Relation of emails works only for modules that have configured prefix (it is not empty).
php.Alert_active_cron_desc: Could not find tasks in schedule for scanner module or one of the tasks is inactive. For email scanner to work properly it needs to have all tasks active for scanning module (MailScannerAction, MailScannerVerification)
php.Alert_active_crontime: Неправилна честота за график на разговори.
php.Alert_active_crontime_desc: Call frequency of "MailScannerAction" task should be at least twice the frequency of "MailScannerVerification" task
php.Alert_scanner_not_work: Няма представка, скенерът на пощата не работи
php.Email_Body:
Здравейте

cron работи прекалено дълго време, проверете дали пощенска система работи правилно.

С увазение, Администратор
php.permissions_user_email: На базата на адреса на потребителя
php.IMAP_ERROR: Не може да се установи връзка със сървъра на имейла
php.ERROR_ACTIVE_CRON: Сканиранто не може да започне, тъй като cron е активен в момента.
php.LBL_EXCEPTIONS_CREATING_EMAIL: Пропуснати адреси при извършването на действие на създаване на имейл съобщения
php.LBL_EXCEPTIONS_CREATING_TICKET: Пропуснати адреси при извършването на действие на създаване на запитвания
php.LBL_ALERT_EDIT_FOLDER: Ако изтриете папката и я добавите отново, mail скенерът ще се рестартита за избраните то вас папки.
